page.title: 13Local News
page.content: {In Newtown quite a lot of teachers {have been on strike for more money. In May a lot of my friends and me went to Staylittle.This is called Penfforddlas in Welsh. We went canoeing and I was frightened at first but I soon got used to it.On the 20 th of June we had sports day.I came third in the flat race,fourth in the obstacle and fourth in the egg and spoon. { Last Saturday was carnival day in {Newtown.I was on the Brownie float and {we dressed up as the Cinderella {story.It was great fun. On Tuesday we went on the nature trail;we saw lots of different insects and flowers.
